long_description: Built with a long (8 in.) inseam for increased support and sun protection, the Zoot Performance Tri shorts enhance your performance in all 3 disciplines. Spandex construction provides excellent muscle support, helping reduce muscle fatigue and extending endurance. All seams use specialized technology to reduce chafing and increase durability, and fabric protects skin against harmful sunlight with a UPF 50+ rating. Soft fleece chamois boosts your comfort in the saddle, and its low-bulk design won't hinder you on the run. Drawcord elasticized waistband provides a secure fit. Specialized hems eliminate the need for elastic grippers, allowing a less restrictive, more comfortable fit. 4-way stretch in the Zoot Performance Tri shorts offers an unrestricted range of motion. 2 easily accessed hip holster pockets integrated into side panels provide secure storage of small essentials and energy food.
short_description: Built with a long (8 in.) inseam for increased support and sun protection, the Zoot Performance Tri shorts enhance your performance in all 3 disciplines.
